Class BookDAO

    IBookDAO

    public class BookDAO
extends java.lang.Object
implements IBookDAO
    Implements the Data Access Object interface defined by IBookDAO

    Pablo Albaladejo Mestre (pablo.albaladejo.mestre@gmail.com)

        public BookDAO()
        throws TransactionException
        Constructs a Book Data Access Object. A stament from the Connection with the DDBB is requested to TransactionManager
        Throws:
        TransactionException - if creating the stament throws an exception
